entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxBusiness FYI Have you heard about the coronavirus pandemic we are going through ? You go to the Senate only for your campaign & bully President Obama when we have over 90,000 Americans Dead. Yes Dead. What is wrong with you ? American Lives are more important than you. #VoteBlue #FireDJT
